Description: A nonmagical weapon you touch becomes a magic weapon. Choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. For the Duration, the weapon has a +1 bonus to attack rolls and deals an extra 1d4 damage of the chosen type when it hits.
AtHigherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th Level, the bonus to attack rolls increases to +2 and the extra damage increases to 2d4. When you use a spell slot of 7th Level or higher, the bonus increases to +3 and the extra damage increases to 3d4.
